collectible.title: First Job T-Shirt
collectible.subtitle: Did someone order an extra sausage pizza?
collectible.text:
Standard issue PizzaWhat! employee shirt. Now you too can live out your days as a struggling pizza boy living paycheck to paycheck! Hooray work!
Pictured: the common occurance of Dwight being told he'd get no tip. Now get back to work, Dwitch!
